body_html:
I did diff between above-mentioned caffe2_pybind11_state.vcxproj files, and here's what I've found:

caffe2_pybind11_state.vcxproj @ /MT
<AdditionalDependencies>C:\Users\XXX\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python37\libs\python37.lib;-WHOLEARCHIVE:C:/Users/XXX/Libs/pytorch/build/lib/Release/caffe2.lib;-WHOLEARCHIVE:C:/Users/XXX/Libs/pytorch/build/lib/Release/caffe2_protos.lib;..\lib\Release\nomnigraph.lib;..\lib\Release\cpuinfo.lib;..\lib\Release\onnxifi_loader.lib;-WHOLEARCHIVE:C:/Users/XXX/Libs/pytorch/build/lib/Release/onnx.lib;..\lib\Release\onnx_proto.lib;..\lib\Release\libprotobuf.lib;kernel32.lib;user32.lib;gdi32.lib;winspool.lib;shell32.lib;ole32.lib;oleaut32.lib;uuid.lib;comdlg32.lib;advapi32.lib</AdditionalDependencies>

caffe2_pybind11_state.vcxproj @ /MD
<AdditionalDependencies>C:\Users\XXX\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python37\libs\python37.lib;..\lib\Release\caffe2.lib;..\lib\Release\libprotobuf.lib;..\lib\Release\nomnigraph.lib;kernel32.lib;user32.lib;gdi32.lib;winspool.lib;shell32.lib;ole32.lib;oleaut32.lib;uuid.lib;comdlg32.lib;advapi32.lib</AdditionalDependencies>

So in /MT there is a lot of additional libraries being linked. Is this a desired behavior?

body:
I did diff between above-mentioned caffe2_pybind11_state.vcxproj files, and here's what I've found:

caffe2_pybind11_state.vcxproj @ /MT
`<AdditionalDependencies>C:\Users\XXX\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python37\libs\python37.lib;-WHOLEARCHIVE:C:/Users/XXX/Libs/pytorch/build/lib/Release/caffe2.lib;-WHOLEARCHIVE:C:/Users/XXX/Libs/pytorch/build/lib/Release/caffe2_protos.lib;..\lib\Release\nomnigraph.lib;..\lib\Release\cpuinfo.lib;..\lib\Release\onnxifi_loader.lib;-WHOLEARCHIVE:C:/Users/XXX/Libs/pytorch/build/lib/Release/onnx.lib;..\lib\Release\onnx_proto.lib;..\lib\Release\libprotobuf.lib;kernel32.lib;user32.lib;gdi32.lib;winspool.lib;shell32.lib;ole32.lib;oleaut32.lib;uuid.lib;comdlg32.lib;advapi32.lib</AdditionalDependencies>`

caffe2_pybind11_state.vcxproj @ /MD
`<AdditionalDependencies>C:\Users\XXX\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python37\libs\python37.lib;..\lib\Release\caffe2.lib;..\lib\Release\libprotobuf.lib;..\lib\Release\nomnigraph.lib;kernel32.lib;user32.lib;gdi32.lib;winspool.lib;shell32.lib;ole32.lib;oleaut32.lib;uuid.lib;comdlg32.lib;advapi32.lib</AdditionalDependencies>`

So in /MT there is a lot of additional libraries being linked. Is this a desired behavior?
